structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.text: It is the intent of the General Assembly to establish a method of providing direct state aid to local public libraries in order to assure their continued existence and to enhance their services for the benefit of the citizens of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 468, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986.
